channel.title: How Do You Change The Speed Of Your Weapon?
channel.description:
Hi, Please can someone help me by telling me how to change the speed you attack an npc. At the moment i hit like, 10 1's within 2 seconds. How could i make it so it's like the normal speed, e.g normal runescape. Also i'm using Testscape so.
Please help
